title: DualAD: Exploring Coupled Dual-Branch Networks for Multi-Class Unsupervised Anomaly Detection
details: S He, Y Chen, L Wang, W Huang, R Xu, Y Qian - Electronics, 2025
abstract: Anomaly detection (AD) is crucial in various domains such as industrial inspection, medical diagnosis, and video surveillance. Previous advancements in unsupervised AD often necessitated training separate models for different objects, which can be …
